desc.one-way: Contacts can view, download, and add the content to their Cozy. If they add the content to their Cozy, they will get updates you make to the content, but they won't be able to update it.
desc.two-way: Contacts can update, delete and add the content to their Cozy. Updates on the content will be seen on other Cozies.

Share.locked-type-file: Coming soon: you will be able to change permissions you grant on the file.
Share.locked-type-folder: Coming soon: you will be able to change permissions you grant on the folder.

permissionRequired.title: Save your contacts in your Cozy?

permissionRequired.success: The application has access to your contacts

unavailable.title: Switch online!
unavailable.message: An internet connection is needed to display the list of your last sharings.

desc.ro: You can view, download, and add this content to your Cozy. You will get updates by the owner, but you won't be able to update this content yourself.
desc.rw: You can view, update, delete and add this content to your Cozy. Updates you make will be seen on other Cozies.
